Text:
I've only listened to the first two tunes so far and I'm already going to say great job Coleman!

Fantastic music and a great tribute to the series...

Can't wait for "The Plan" to come out in November.
Nice one.  Glad it worked for ya.  I've been awaiting this for what seems like years.  And it has not dissappointed me. Its Amazing.

Just finished listening to it. Guys and gals... If you liked the first 4 albums, this will blow you away!

Simply Frackin' Fantastic

And so say we all!

If it's so shit here, go somewhere else bellend!

And if you got banned there's a reason, so aim your defence at TPB and not here!

ThankÂ´s very good.
Any way, I will buy it when coming to my country. Just for paying Bear efforts

Thank you so much for a great soundtrack.  Great Sound.  I was suprised that season 4 was 2 CDs.

For those who are into soundtracks, and especially BSG soundtracks I recommend wikipedia for more information.  It is great for song and file lists.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_of_Battlestar_Galactica_(reimagining)

Dude you're not kidding. I literally can't wait for the Plan. BSG for fuckin LIFE dude. Bear McCrearys music is seriously fantastic and it tied in so extremely well with the series. Listening to Storming New Caprica from Season 3 as I write this, case in hand.
The damn ")" wouldn't stick to the url, so for those who think there is something wrong with wiki or the url: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Music_of_Battlestar_Galactica_(reimagining)
Btw... Nice upload, awesome music, thnx!!!

Kara Remembers is a awesome song.. 

thanks a ton

This is fantastic. 
Gaeta's Lament is one of the best composed songs I've heard in a long while.

Thanks for uploading!
